2005500.name: The Minesweeper: Crew Bomber Expedition
2005500.description:
THE CLASSIC MINESWEEPER ON STEAM


Minesweeper easily sharpens your mind and increases your thinking speed. At the same time, it is a fun and challenging logic puzzle.

THE GAME


The goal of the minesweeper game is to destroy the minefield without detonating any of the landmines. Use flags to mark the mines and tap the numbers to open safe squares. Now you can also enjoy an alternative style of minesweeper for the non-conformists.

FEATURES


  • Simple controls
  • First touch luck
  • Optional sound assistance
  • 2 skins, including classic
  • All 3 classic difficulties
  • Fully configurable in terms of board size and number of mines

Minesweeper for beginners and advanced players. Whether you want to relax or keep your mind active, spend some quality time with The Minesweeper Crew: Bomber Expedition. Enjoy the best mine detector in the world at any time!
